relation: spend time with my family, play games and study
There are a lot of bumps in the road, but hang in there. Its worth it in the end
I am a returning student here at TSTC that should say alot. Im am working on my second degree.

textBeforeTable: 01/15/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 7 people found this review useful. 1 of 27 Justin from Round Rock, TX Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students If your looking for a college to get you started this is the best and the easiest on your wallet.You can get all of your basics out of the way and TSTC can get you a job easier with there job fairs. Bang for the buck TSTC will get you prepared within close to two years for any field you can think of. You have a range of classes to online or in person, the choice is yours. Am enjoying being here There's a lot of characters here. You'll meet every type of click of groups here. You have your grease monkeys, punks, goths, and cyber geeks like me. Am learning a lot The computer science field is amazing. You have teachers that are there to help you. The director is Rodney and hes a nice guy and loves his hair cuts. TSTC is a good quick field if you want to start a job somewhere you love quick. Login to rate or flag the reviews Brandon from Waco, TX 06/15/2012
